title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 270-6.3 - Special uses
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 270-6.3 - Special uses

State Regulations

Condominiums and cooperative forms of real property
ownership, residential multi-lot subdivision and keyhole developments and their
accompanying use of structures on State-owned lands underwater including those
described in article 6 of the Public Lands Law shall be appraised based upon
market analysis of comparable structures. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
§§
270-6.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
